document_data.name: Lord Dheolur
document_data.mainbody: '''Lord Dheolur''' was the head of the [[Dheolur]] noble house of [[Cormyr]] in the 5{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He married [[Threena Cormaeril]]. His sister was [[Pella Dheolur]].
document_data.Description: He wore a suit of black chased and fluted plate armor with a helm, from [[Chondath]], and bore a long slightly curved blade.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|432}}, Dheolur was killed by King [[Duar Obarskyr]] after his house had defected against Cormyr to side with [[Magrath the Minotaur]]. Duar severed Dheolur's head from his body with the sword ''[[Orbyn]]''.
